info.name: EventBook Platform API
info.description: Complete API collection for EventBook - Mini Event Booking Platform built with NestJS and Prisma

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register a new user account
Login with existing user credentials. This will automatically store the JWT token in environment variable.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration and login

request.description: Get all events (public endpoint, no authentication required)

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": "event-uuid-1",
    "title": "Tech Conference 2024",
    "description": "Annual technology conference featuring latest trends",
    "date": "2024-06-15T09:00:00.000Z",
    "location": "Convention Center",
    "capacity": 500,
    "price": 99.99,
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/tech-conf.jpg",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
  }
]

request.description: Get only upcoming events (events with dates in the future)

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": "event-uuid-1",
    "title": "Future Event",
    "description": "An event happening in the future",
    "date": "2025-06-15T09:00:00.000Z",
    "location": "Future Venue",
    "capacity": 100,
    "price": 50.00,
    "imageUrl": null,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
  }
]

variable.description: The ID of the event to retrieve

request.description: Get a specific event by its ID

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "id": "event-uuid-1",
  "title": "Tech Conference 2024",
  "description": "Annual technology conference featuring latest trends",
  "date": "2024-06-15T09:00:00.000Z",
  "location": "Convention Center",
  "capacity": 500,
  "price": 99.99,
  "imageUrl": "https://example.com/tech-conf.jpg",
  "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
}

request.description: Get available capacity for a specific event (requires authentication)

body.raw:
{
  "title": "New Tech Meetup",
  "description": "A meetup for tech enthusiasts to network and learn",

  "location": "Tech Hub Downtown",
  "capacity": 100,
  "price": 25.00,
  "imageUrl": "https://example.com/meetup.jpg"
}

request.description: Create a new event (requires admin authentication)

response.name: Success Response

body.raw:
{
  "title": "New Tech Meetup",
  "description": "A meetup for tech enthusiasts to network and learn",
  "date": "2024-12-15T18:00:00.000Z",
  "location": "Tech Hub Downtown",
  "capacity": 100,
  "price": 25.00,
  "imageUrl": "https://example.com/meetup.jpg"
}

response.body:
{
  "id": "new-event-uuid",
  "title": "New Tech Meetup",

  "location": "Tech Hub Downtown",
  "capacity": 100,
  "price": 25.00,

variable.description: The ID of the event to update

request.description: Update an existing event (requires admin authentication)

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "id": "event-uuid-1",
  "title": "Updated Tech Meetup",
  "description": "Updated description for the meetup",
  "date": "2024-06-15T09:00:00.000Z",
  "location": "Convention Center",
  "capacity": 500,
  "price": 30.00,

  "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T11:00:00.000Z"
}

variable.description: The ID of the event to delete

request.description: Delete an event (requires admin authentication)
Create a new booking for an event (requires authentication)
Get all bookings for the authenticated user

variable.description: The ID of the booking to retrieve

request.description: Get a specific booking by its ID (user can only access their own bookings)

variable.description: The ID of the booking to cancel

request.description: Cancel a booking (user can only cancel their own bookings)
Get all bookings for a specific event (requires admin authentication)
Get booking statistics (requires admin authentication)

item.name: Admin Dashboard

request.description: Get comprehensive dashboard statistics including users, events, bookings, and revenue (Admin only)
Get all users with their booking counts (Admin only)
Get user statistics including most active users (Admin only)
Get all events with detailed statistics including occupancy rates (Admin only)
Get event statistics including upcoming vs past events and most popular events (Admin only)
Get detailed booking information for a specific event with statistics (Admin only)
Get all bookings across the platform with user and event details (Admin only)
Get comprehensive booking statistics with percentages and revenue (Admin only)
Get detailed revenue statistics and recent bookings (Admin only)

item.description: Comprehensive admin dashboard endpoints for platform management and analytics

request.description: Basic health check endpoint to verify API is running

exec: // Global test to log response time

variable.description: Base URL for the EventBook API
JWT authentication token (automatically set after login)
Current authenticated user ID (automatically set after login)
